name: Scott V
text: Never had any issues with service here. I often order from this location for myself and several co-workers and never experienced any problems. One of the go to places in the area.

name: Logan Schauer
text: Quick, fast, friendly. Korean BBQ sandwhich is the way to go for sure. I always throw in a whoopie pie. Not the healthiest option. But usually delicious.

name: Earl Wright
text: The food sucked. The employees were literally unknown about what they were doing and I called my order in and still took a hour to get my cold food and they forgot half of my order.  I will never go to this dump again. Very disappointed by …More

name: j barksdale
text: A good hot sandwich fresh off the grill. At a fair price.

name: Jake Lareau
text: I see all these bad reviews, i've been going here for years.  Never had a bad experience.  Coming from someone who has worked in the restaurant business for 5 years, they are always on their game.  Half the time the "got my order wrong" is when the customer gave the wrong order

name: Lisa Laki
text: In the Barrington store tonight, on a Friday during a dinner rush (and for the rest of the shift, I’m sure), this very kind, patient and amazing man was working alone (I unfortunately did not get his name). No co-workers at all with him. …More

name: Joe Faria
text: Great group of employees at this location. Food is great and always ready in a good timely manner!!

name: Joyce Pellegrini
text: Employees are very friendly. Fast service and very clean.

name: Bobby G
text: After getting cold food from here numerous times tonight tops it all. Not only was the order wrong for the 20th time but I received a nasty attitude from there employee. Not once have I got anything from this place and it was right. I wouldn't step foot in there again

name: Renee Vieira
text: 4/10/2018 kid took phone off the hook right in front of customers, I ordered a steak and cheese and got a cheese sandwich for $10
